result.arabic_text: وَيَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلۡغَمَٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا
result.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ibuka n’umusi ijuru ryasadaguritse hakibonekeza mu migaga yaryo ibicu vyererana, abamalayika na bo bakamanuka ku bwinshi, kugira bakikuze ibiremwa kw’iyegeranirizo, maze Imana Allah Igaseruka mu buryo buberanye n'icubahiro cayo kugira Ibitunganirize.
